description: Provides a resource to create an audit.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AuditSwitch.description: Indicate whether to turn on audit logging or not.

CosBucket.description: Name of the cos bucket to save audit log. Caution: the validation of existing cos bucket will not be checked by terraform.

EnableKmsEncry.description: Indicate whether the log is encrypt with KMS algorithm or not.

KeyId.description: Existing CMK unique key. This field can be get by data source `tencentcloud_audit_key_alias`. Caution: the region of the KMS must be as same as the `cos_region`.

LogFilePrefix.description: The log file name prefix. The length ranges from 3 to 40. If not set, the account ID will be the log file prefix.

Name.description: Name of audit. Valid length ranges from 3 to 128. Only alpha character or numbers or '_' supported.

ReadWriteAttribute.description: Event attribute filter. Valid values: `1`, `2`, `3`. `1` for readonly, `2` for write-only, `3` for all.
